column1: The data file contains predictions for the trait and variable values throughout the day based on the generalised additive model fits for their diurnal patterns.

column3: time of day. A value of 11.5 hour corresponds to 11:30 am.
stem xylem water potential value relative to the maximum absolute value
leaf water potential value relative to the maximum absolute value
photosynthetic rate value relative to the maximum absolute value
stomatal conductance value relative to the maximum absolute value
water use efficiency value relative to the maximum absolute value
transpiration rate value relative to the maximum absolute value
leaf-to-air vapour pressure deficit value relative to the maximum absolute value
difference between stem xylem and leaf water potential values
